definition: to agree without prior consultation/to happen to hold the same view
(negative prefix)/not/no
to plan/to seek/scheme
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
variant of 合[he2]

sentences.english: Lincoln's words paraphrase the thoughts Azariah expressed to King Asa of Judah.
sentences.chinese: 林肯的话，与亚撒利雅对犹大王亚撒说的话不谋而合。

sentences.english: The precise health wallop you suffer may have to do with how your body manifests stress.
sentences.chinese: 你遭受的健康冲击可能与身体所表现出来的不谋而合。

sentences.english: It also happened to coincide with a screening organized by the U.N. press corps.
sentences.chinese: 而且它又与联合国记者团组织的审查不谋而合。

sentences.english: The proposal happened to coincide with the strategy of Jinan district government.
sentences.chinese: 金建琳的这份建议与晋安区政府的设想不谋而合。

sentences.english: Your name is the same with oen of my best friends in chian .
sentences.chinese: 你的名字和我在中国的一个好朋友的名字不谋而合。

sentences.english: This is the traditional medicine of "prevent disease" thinking in line.
sentences.chinese: 这与祖国医学的“治未病”思想不谋而合。

definition: to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to

to be a good fit/to be identical with/to adjust oneself to/to fit in
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
to seal/to confirm/to corroborate/to verify
to fit in with/to suit/appropriate
different tunes played with equal skill (idiom)/different methods leading to the same result/different approach but equally satisfactory outcome
idea/concept/philosophy/theory
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
consistent/constant/from start to finish/all along/persistent
curious coincidence
to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
